name: 2048 With a Twist 3D
description:
A classic game of 2048 with a "twist" where you can literally twist the game field to gain access to the full 3D experience.

Controls:

WASD - shift small cubes

Arrow keys - rotate the main cube

Mouse - everything else

Based on a game "2048" by Gabriele Cirulli.
"Icons made by Freepik and Alfredo Hernandez from www.flaticon.com"

If you liked it you can also check out the mobile version on google play.
